title: Parallel Realities - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/11/22
itunes:title: Parallel Realities - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/11/22
description:
George Noory and author Suzanne Ross discuss her research into parallel realities and how each decision we make can create a new universe, plus her concerns about the increased dependence on technology in modern society which is keeping people from reaching true enlightenment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
